column4: I've seen posts saying "deb http://people.ubuntu.com/~doko/OOo2/ ./" for OOo2 (not tried it personally though)
well.. would be nice if i could to this automatically by synaptic
that's exactly what you can do if you add that deb line to your sources.list :)
ah, i'm with you now.  It might be added to the official backports repository but i don't know
